about_the_game:
Do you want to cut and get out the excellent part in an audio file? Do you want to join a lot of audio files into one file? Please test Free MP3 Cutter Joiner. It will be your best choice. Free MP3 Cutter Joiner consists of a MP3 Cutter and a MP3 Joiner. It is much easier for you to get highlights from MP3 files with MP3 Cutter function, howerver, with MP3 Joiner function, you can perfectly join many audio files into one.
Key Features
Cut pieces from big audio files and then convert them in MP3 format
Cut/join with high precision and without losing quality
Merge multiple files or parts of multiple files into one big file
With a small player built in for pre-listening
